title: Ruby sightstone Passive???
body:
The passive has said it reduces the cool down of active items by 10% and hex tech items I've played plenty of supports with hex tech item and the sight stone and it seems to not reduce the cool down of it. am i just missing something or the hex tech on the ruby sight stone isn't these hex tech items???

PS. They have changed the tool tip but still does it reduce it or not??
